title: The Death of Saul
summary: In a tragic end, Saul and his sons are killed by the Philistines in battle on Mount Gilboa. Saul, wounded and fearing capture, falls on his sword. The Philistines display his body, but the men of Jabesh-Gilead recover and bury him.

faq.question: How did Saul die?
faq.answer: He fell on his sword after being critically wounded in battle.

faq.question: What did the people of Jabesh-Gilead do?
faq.answer: They bravely recovered and buried Saul and his sons with honor.
